name: APT16
descr: [APT16](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0023) is a China-based threat group that has launched spearphishing campaigns targeting Japanese and Taiwanese organizations. (Citation: FireEye EPS Awakens Part 2)

subtechniques.name: Server
subtechniques.descr: [APT16](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0023) has compromised otherwise legitimate sites as staging servers for second-stage payloads.(Citation: FireEye EPS Awakens Part 2)

FireEye EPS Awakens Part 2.description: Winters, R. (2015, December 20). The EPS Awakens - Part 2. Retrieved January 22, 2016.
